description: This file contains Python code for generating JSON-RPC API C++ headers, source files, and associated code based on schema inputs. It includes functions for parsing schemas, generating header files, emitting classes, enums, version info, stubs, and RPC code, with detailed handling of file modification times and configurations.

methods.name: CreateApiHeader(log, source_name, path, headers)
methods.description: Generates a C++ header file with JSON-RPC API definitions, including necessary includes and a standardized header comment.

methods.name: Create(log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs, generate_rpc)
methods.description: Main function that parses a JSON schema and generates C++ header/source files, enums, version info, stubs, and RPC code depending on configuration flags and schema contents.

ctags.name: Create
ctags.pattern: /^def Create(log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs/
ctags.signature: (log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs, generate_rpc)
